body:
Often observed in logs:

```
 Couldn't sync containers: [remove /var/lib/kubelet/pods/189d622a-1e04-11e5-a1b8-
42010af09b2c/volumes/kubernetes.io~secret/default-token-zlfss: device or resource busy, remove /var/lib/kubelet/pods/189e2f9e-1e04-11e5-a1b8-42010af09b2c/volumes/kubernetes.io~secret/default-
token-zlfss: device or resource busy, remove /var/lib/kubelet/pods/1efbc818-1e04-11e5-a1b8-42010af09b2c/volumes/kubernetes.io~secret/default-token-zlfss: device or resource busy, remove 
/var/lib/kubelet/pods/21e75aa3-1e04-11e5-a1b8-42010af09b2c/volumes/kubernetes.io~secret/default-token-zlfss: device or resource busy, remove /var/lib/kubelet/pods/24b47454-1e04-11e5-a1b8-
42010af09b2c/volumes/kubernetes.io~secret/default-token-zlfss: device or resource busy, remove /var/lib/kubelet/pods/26582f9c-1e04-11e5-a1b8-42010af09b2c/volumes/kubernetes.io~secret/default-
token-zlfss: device or resource busy, remove /var/lib/kubelet/pods/29b63086-1e04-11e5-a1b8-42010af09b2c/volumes/kubernetes.io~secret/default-token-zlfss: device or resource busy, remove 
/var/lib/kubelet/pods/2afcf998-1e04-11e5-a1b8-42010af09b2c/volumes/kubernetes.io~secret/default-token-zlfss: device or resource busy, remove /var/lib/kubelet/pods/2d05a2c7-1e04-11e5-a1b8-
42010af09b2c/volumes/kubernetes.io~secret/default-token-zlfss: device or resource busy, remove /var/lib/kubelet/pods/2ecfa66b-1e04-11e5-a1b8-42010af09b2c/volumes/kubernetes.io~secret/default-
token-zlfss: device or resource busy, remove /var/lib/kubelet/pods/3ec08d37-1e04-11e5-a1b8-42010af09b2c/volumes/kubernetes.io~secret/default-token-zlfss: device or resource busy, remove 
/var/lib/kubelet/pods/42ecbd3f-1e04-11e5-a1b8-42010af09b2c/volumes/kubernetes.io~secret/default-token-zlfss: device or resource busy, remove /var/lib/kubelet/pods/4502b6c5-1e04-11e5-a1b8-
42010af09b2c/volumes/kubernetes.io~secret/default-token-zlfss: device or resource busy, remove /var/lib/kubelet/pods/4630c404-1e05-11e5-a1b8-42010af09b2c/volumes/kubernetes.io~secret/default-
token-zlfss: device or resource busy, remove /var/lib/kubelet/pods/4718c0dc-1e04-11e5-a1b8-42010af09b2c/volumes/kubernetes.io~secret/default-token-zlfss: device or resource busy, remove 
/var/lib/kubelet/pods/4dbd58f2-1e04-11e5-a1b8-42010af09b2c/volumes/kubernetes.io~secret/default-token-zlfss: device or resource busy, remove /var/lib/kubelet/pods/512bab30-1e04-11e5-a1b8-
42010af09b2c/volumes/kubernetes.io~secret/default-token-zlfss: device or resource busy, remove /var/lib/kubelet/pods/51ae59e9-1e04-11e5-a1b8-42010af09b2c/volumes/kubernetes.io~secret/default-
token-zlfss: device or resource busy, remove /var/lib/kubelet/pods/520978bb-1e04-11e5-a1b8-42010af09b2c/volumes/kubernetes.io~secret/default-token-zlfss: device or resource busy, remove 
/var/lib/kubelet/pods/558d5be0-1e04-11e5-a1b8-42010af09b2c/volumes/kubernetes.io~secret/default-token-zlfss: device or resource busy, remove /var/lib/kubelet/pods/588801c2-1e04-11e5-a1b8-
42010af09b2c/volumes/kubernetes.io~secret/default-token-zlfss: device or resource busy, remove /var/lib/kubelet/pods/7102cb27-1eb7-11e5-a1b8-42010af09b2c/volumes/kubernetes.io~secret/default-
token-n6j66: device or resource busy, remove /var/lib/kubelet/pods/721a038a-1e04-11e5-a1b8-42010af09b2c/volumes/kubernetes.io~secret/default-token-zlfss: device or resource busy, remove /var/lib/kubelet/pods/780ab3ea-1e04-11e5-a1b8-42010af09b2c/volumes/kubernetes.io~secret/default-token-zlfss: device or resource busy, remove /var/lib/kubelet/pods/784aa9e6-1e04-11e5-a1b8-42010af09b2c/volumes/kubernetes.io~secret/default-token-zlfss: device or resource busy, remove /var/lib/kubelet/pods/7c80a67c-1e04-11e5-a1b8-42010af09b2c/volumes/kubernetes.io~secret/default-token-zlfss: device or resource busy, remove /var/lib/kubelet/pods/7e1ca5bb-1e04-11e5-a1b8-42010af09b2c/volumes/kubernetes.io~secret/default-token-zlfss: device or resource busy, remove /var/lib/kubelet/pods/8597b64f-1e04-11e5-a1b8-42010af09b2c/volumes/kubernetes.io~secret/default-token-zlfss: device or resource busy]
```

However:

```
$ sudo cat /proc/mounts  | grep 189d622a-1e04-11e5-a1b8-42010af09b2c
tmpfs /var/lib/kubelet/pods/189d622a-1e04-11e5-a1b8-42010af09b2c/volumes/kubernetes.io~secret/default-token-zlfss tmpfs rw,relatime 0 0

$ sudo fuser -vm /var/lib/kubelet/pods/21e75aa3-1e04-11e5-a1b8-42010af09b2c/volumes/kubernetes.io~secret/default-token-zlfss
                     USER        PID ACCESS COMMAND
/var/lib/kubelet/pods/21e75aa3-1e04-11e5-a1b8-42010af09b2c/volumes/kubernetes.io~secret/default-token-zlfss:
                     root     kernel mount /var/lib/kubelet/pods/21e75aa3-1e04-11e5-a1b8-42010af09b2c/volumes/kubernetes.io~secret/default-token-zlfss
```

Which probably means we'd be ok unmounting it:

```
$ sudo umount /var/lib/kubelet/pods/189d622a-1e04-11e5-a1b8-42010af09b2c/volumes/kubernetes.io~secret/default-token-zlfss
$ sudo rm -rf /var/lib/kubelet/pods/189d622a-1e04-11e5-a1b8-42010af09b2c/volumes/kubernetes.io~secret/default-token-zlfss
```

This probably also means we don't delete orphaned mirror pods, which is the next step in SyncPods (https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/blob/master/pkg/kubelet/kubelet.go#L1477).

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG Node.
labels.name: sig/node

title: Kubelet should unmount before trying to remove orphaned pod dirs
